Evly.com http://www.evly.com VP, head of business development, Co-Founder January 2010 â€“ Present (9 months)

evly is a paltform where organizations and individuals are offered flexible, powerful freemium self-service crowdsourcing tools and sites where they can invite their existing communities and databases to set out challenges for them to participate in.

One of our key differentiators is that the users also become part of a much larger social network called evly where an expert system works in tandem with a recommendation engine to suggest the right challenges for them to get involved in and thus cross-pollinate the users across all the new challenges and networks.

I have a 1hr technology talk show every week on KFM Cape Talk Radio and Radio 702 simulcast introducing new exciting technology and gadgets to listeners, discussing aspirational and current technology, interviewing interesting people in the field of consumer-related and developing technology, reviewing gadgets as well as answering technology related queries live - ungeeking the geek, as it were.

————————————————– Springleap.com http://www.springleap.com Co-Founder October 2007 â€“ Present (3 years)

Springleap.com is a design crowdsourcing website with a large community of artists and voters who can enter their designs for a t-shirt every fortnight to win cash, royalties and exposure. The community get to vote which designs win.

Moving forward the design catalog will be implemented on a variety of new products ranging from laptop skins, mobile phone skins to posters and beach blankets.

Springleap also allow other companies and individuals to host their own design competitions on Springleap to tap into the creative power of the community and enjoy a powerful marketing experience.

Springleap also handle promotional and corporate printing for many companies in who seek a top-end retail quality product for their promotions and internal corporate wear at extremely competitive rates.
